did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: The John Franklin Croom Hunter Papers contain class notes, exams, essays, lab books, and other papers relating to courses concerning human physiology, pharmacology, the biological sciences, chemistry, physics, and other subjects, most of which were taken by John Franklin Croom Hunter or S. B. Hunter (both class of 1940) at the Medical College of Virginia in Richmond. Also includes several issues of the PHI CHI QUARTERLY (1940).

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], John Franklin Croom Hunter Papers, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The John Franklin Croom Hunter Papers were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 1987.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Encoded by Jennifer Snow and Carrie Mills, May 2011
Accession(s) described in this finding aid: 87-146
This collection is minimally processed: materials may not have been ordered and described beyond their original condition.
Descriptive sources and standards used to create this inventory: DACS, EAD, NCEAD guidelines, and local Style Guide.
This finding aid is NCEAD compliant.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The John Franklin Croom Hunter Papers contain class notes, exams, essays, lab books, and other papers relating to courses concerning human physiology, pharmacology, the biological sciences, chemistry, physics, and other subjects, most of which were taken by John Franklin Croom Hunter or S. B. Hunter (both class of 1940) at the Medical College of Virginia in Richmond. Also includes several issues of the PHI CHI QUARTERLY (1940).

controlaccess.head: Subject Headings
controlaccess.p: These are searchable subject entries for this collection. Performing a search on these subjects in the Duke University Libraries online catalog will bring up other related research materials.

did.unittitle: Serials (Phi Chi Quarterly and others), exam books, notebooks, and other course materials
